item.description:
Toys is taking the Free RPG Game day and turning it into a weekend long event. Starting from 11AM on SaturdayJune 18th to late Sunday night players will be able to check out free offerings from various publishers and take part in different demos.
Many publishers are taking part in this year's Free RPG day including Paizo, WotC, Whitewolf, Pinnacle, Fantasy Flight, and Green Ronin. Toys will run demos for three or more players who want to try a specific adventure.Those who wish to GM are welcome to run a session as long as they are familiar with the system being used. Light snacks will served to those taking part.
item.name: Free RPG Weekend at Toys
